COMMENT_TX: fan interference

ej,guilj001,P,cuzzp901,Walking towards mound after striking out Guillen yelled at Donnelly and was ejected by HP umpire Phil Cuzzi when he walked towards the mound; the benches cleared but no punches were thrown
ej,donnb001,P,cuzzp901,Intentional HBP Red Sox pitcher Brendan Donnelly ejected by HP umpire Phil Cuzzi
Angels right fielder Vladimir Guerrero left the game due to an injured hand/wrist
Yankees catcher Jorge Posada left the game due to an injured left thumb
$ARod's 12th homer in April
$over the seats into the street

$the fifth time in history that a team hit four consecutive homers; second time that they were surrendered by one pitcher (Paul Foytack); J.D. Drew also was part of the previous instance on 9/18/2006 with the Dodgers
infield shifted to right for Giambi
Blue Jays catcher Gregg Zaun left the game due to an injured hand/wrist
fan interference
ej,gereb001,M,relic901,Balls and strikes Athletics Manager Bob Geren ejected by HP umpire Charlie Reliford for arguing the checked swing on the third strike to Chavez
originally scored CS2 with E2, changed next day
Orioles pitcher Jon Leicester left the game due to an injured neck/shoulder
Red Sox pitcher Josh Beckett left the game due to an injured finger
$Kevin Youkilis called for interference
$Drew hurt his back on top of wall leaping for homer
$Drew leaves here after bruising back in 3rd
Red Sox pitcher Devern Hansack left the game due to an injured hand/wrist
fan interference
$hit on the wrist
Red Sox third baseman Mike Lowell left the game due to an injured wrist

ej,torrj101,M,crawj901,Caught stealing call at 3B $Yankee Mgr Joe Torre argued the caught stealing, went back to the dugout and then came out two pitches later to argue again; he was ejected by 3B umpire Jerry Crawford
Boston Red Sox right fielder J. D. Drew left the game due to a right hamstring strain
ej,procs001,P,onorb901,Intentional HBP $both benches cleared after Youkilis took a few steps to the mound; Yankees pitcher Scott Proctor ejected by HP umpire Brian O'Nora

Mientkiewicz dove sideways for Jeter's wide throw and Lowell's left knee struck the back of Mientkiewicz's head; he was placed on the 15-day DL with a mild concussion, cervical sprain and fractured scaphoid bone in his right wrist

ej,ortid001,P,randt901,Called third strike Red Sox designated hitter David Ortiz ejected by HP umpire Tony Randazzo; he argued the called third strike at the plate and then threw his helmet back towards the field when he reached the dugout
Debut game for Jacoby Ellsbury
fan interference
$Devil Rays catcher Dioner Navarro collided with Josh Beckett behind 1B; he had to be helped off the field and was taken to the hospital for x-rays he left the game due to an injured head
ej,gibbj001,M,hirsj901,Call at 1B Blue Jays Manager John Gibbons ejected by 1B umpire John Hirschbeck for arguing the call at first; replays showed that Overbay tagged Lugo
the foul that Ortiz hit for strike 2 was directly onto his already damaged right knee (torn meniscus since 2006)
Red Sox right fielder J. D. Drew left the game due to an injured leg
$1:56 rain delay before start

ej,frant001,M,mcclt901,Non home run call over LF wall $the ball hit above the wall but was ruled in play; the apparent 3-run homer turned into 1 run and an out at the plate; Red Sox Manager Terry Francona ejected by 3B umpire Tim McClelland while arguing the call
$Ortiz strained his left shoulder on the slide
Red Sox designated hitter David Ortiz left the game due to a left shoulder strain
Debut game for Ehren Wassermann
Debut game for Clay Buchholz
Red Sox catcher Doug Mirabelli left the game due to a strained right calf

ej,youkk001,P,rungb901,Checked swing ej,frant001,M,wegnm901,Checked swing $Kevin Youkilis tipped the third pitch on a check swing and was called out on appeal by 1B umpire Mark Wegner; Youkilis ejected by HP umpire Brian Runge; Red Sox Manager Terry Francona ejected by 1B umpire Wegner for arguing
Angels second baseman Erick Aybar left the game due to an injured leg
$J. D. Drew fouled a ball off his foot
Red Sox right fielder J. D. Drew left the game due to an injured foot

ej,tremd801,M,westj901,Obstruction non-call Orioles Manager Dave Trembley ejected by 1B umpire Joe West; he came out to ask 3B umpire Ed Hickox whether catcher Kevin Cash obstructed a runner; West came over and ejected Trembley
$Clay Buchholz threw a no hitter in his second major league start
Youkilis was hit on the right wrist and left with a bruised wrist
Debut game for Bronson Sardinha
Red Sox center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury left the game due to an injured leg
$Twins messed up rundown; Ellsbury out on grounder that was fielded in baseline, but Youkilis got back to first without a throw
fan interference
